description:
Thanks to DJI for sponsoring this video! Purchase a DJI Power 1000 at: https://amzn.to/4ejQu5e  (Amazon)

Camping is a great time all around. You get to be in the great outdoors, enjoy a nice campfire or two, and maybe play some video games on your sweet PCs. Wait a second, that last one isn’t typical, but we made it a thing with the Ultimate Gamer Camper Van.

Discuss on the forum: https://linustechtips.com/topic/1573732-the-ultimate-gamer-camper-van/

Check out the PC Components:

AMD Ryzen 7 7800X3D CPU: https://geni.us/3fVGdST
ASRock B650E PG-ITX Motherboard: https://geni.us/6ABBX
Corsair Vengeance 6000MT/S CL36 16GBx2 DDR5 RAM: https://geni.us/t6LlF0
Cooler Master V1100 SFX 1100W 90+ Platinum PSU: https://geni.us/KZo4I1
ASUS Dual GeForce RTX 4060 Ti Graphics Card: https://geni.us/XMB5n
Corsair MP700 Pro 2TB 2280 NVMe M.2 SSD: https://geni.us/rl4wkaY
Corsair H100x RGB Elite 240mm AIO Cooler: https://geni.us/kNiW

Check out the Other Components and Parts:

ASUS ZenScreen MB16QHG 16
title: The Ultimate Gamer Camper Van
